title: Theme Team!
body:
Anyone up for having a Pool Party/Snow Day or fire/ice skin team, playing together just having fun regardless of having bad games and won't complain?
I have Pool Party Leona, Pool Party Ziggs, Pool Party Lulu, Pool Party Rek'Sai, Snow Day Ziggs, Snow Day Syndra, Ice Drake Shyvana, Winter Wonder Lulu, Poro Rider Sejuani, Artic Ops Varus, Atlantean Syndra and Frostfire Annie :)
